fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path to the bank's logo

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: Period covered by the bank statement

fields.name: account_holder_address
fields.description: Address of the account holder

fields.name: account_number
fields.description: Account number associated with this statement

fields.name: total_pages
fields.description: Total number of pages in the bank statement

fields.name: summary.overdraft_protection1
fields.description: First overdraft protection information provided by Pnc Bank

fields.name: summary.overdraft_protection2
fields.description: Second overdraft protection information provided by Pnc Bank

fields.name: summary.overdraft_status
fields.description: Current overdraft status of the account

fields.name: summary.beginning_balance
fields.description: Balance at the start of the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total amount deposited during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total amount withdrawn during the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_balance
fields.description: Balance at the end of the statement period

fields.name: summary.average_balance
fields.description: Average balance for the statement period

fields.name: summary.fees
fields.description: Total fees charged during the statement period

fields.name: summary.checks_written
fields.description: Number of checks written during the statement period

fields.name: summary.pos_transactions
fields.description: Total number of POS transactions

fields.name: summary.pos_pin_transactions
fields.description: Number of POS transactions with PIN

fields.name: summary.total_atm_transactions
fields.description: Total number of ATM transactions

fields.name: summary.pnc_atm_transactions
fields.description: Number of PNC-owned ATM transactions

fields.name: summary.other_atm_transactions
fields.description: Number of other ATM transactions

fields.name: summary.apy_earned
fields.description: Annual Percentage Yield earned on the account

fields.name: summary.days_in_period
fields.description: Number of days covered by the statement period

fields.name: summary.average_collected_balance
fields.description: Average collected balance during the statement period

fields.name: summary.interest_paid_period
fields.description: Interest paid for the current period

fields.name: summary.interest_paid_ytd
fields.description: Total interest paid year to date

fields.name: transaction.date
fields.description: Date of the transaction

fields.name: transaction.amount
fields.description: Amount of the transaction

fields.name: transaction.description
fields.description: Description or purpose of the transaction

fields.name: transactions|selectattr('type', 'equalto', 'deposit')|list|length
fields.description: Number of deposit transactions in the statement

fields.name: transactions|selectattr('type', 'equalto', 'electronic')|list|length
fields.description: Number of electronic transactions in the statement

fields.name: transactions|selectattr('type', 'equalto', 'other')|list|length
fields.description: Number of other transactions in the statement

fields.name: row.date1
fields.description: Date of a specific transaction row

fields.name: row.bal1
fields.description: Balance before a specific transaction

fields.name: row.date2
fields.description: Second date of a specific transaction row

fields.name: row.bal2
fields.description: Balance after the second transaction of a specific row

fields.name: row.date3
fields.description: Third date of a specific transaction row (if applicable)

fields.name: row.bal3
fields.description: Balance after the third transaction of a specific row (if applicable)

fields.name: current_page
fields.description: Current page number of the bank statement

fields.name: total_pages
fields.description: Total number of pages in the bank statement
